name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Melvin THOMAS, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Melvin THOMAS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gene D. Cohen, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., David Da Costa, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
455 A.2d 630
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Melvin THOMAS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 8, 1982.
Decided Jan. 31, 1983.
Gene D. Cohen, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., David Da Costa, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
